ComicInfo.Summary: In a world where nerds evolved from man, the staff of PvP Magazine rule as kings. Join Brent, Cole, Francis, Jade and Skull the Troll as they chronicle the world of video games, movies, comics and pop-culture. The hit internet comic strip leaps from the World Wide Web into its own image title!Â "Lost and Found!" Fed up with Brent's constant bullying, Skull the troll runs away from home. Afraid that Skull won't survive long on his own, the PvP gang force Brent out into the cold after him. Features some unexpected cameos from familiar Image titles as well as the now infamous PANDA ATTACK!
